content:
Breakfast - 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM, daily

LET'S GRAB COFFEE.

Chances are we’re just as particular about our coffee as you are. Commons Cafe offers locally sourced fair trade coffee from Marin County as well as farm fresh breakfast options. It’s perfect for getting your caffeine fix as you head out the door, or for enjoying the buffet-style offerings on mornings when you feel like hanging around.
